resources.string: App Ver." + " is now available. Your are currently using older Ver."
Install new version to use this app
"Please contact IT Team (Failed to update DB)"
Are you sure, you want to continue - interview
"Both Month and Year don\'t be zero!!"
You have entered only %1$s of %2$s Children in the household. \nAre you sure you want to continue now?
You have already entered %1$s Children. \nAre you sure you want to add more Child?
No Mother has been selected. Please select a mother before opening Child List
Username and Password cannot be same.
Please fill child sections before entering this information
Name and contact number of the head of Household:
How many members are living in this household? (NUMBER OF PERSONS) (If 95 or more, record ‘95’) Note for enumorators: Persons who live in this dwelling/ compound and usually share a meal together
(NUMBER OF PERSONS) (If 95 or more, record ‘95’) Note for enumerators: Persons who live in this dwelling/ compound and usually share a meal together
Does this HH have children 06-23 months years of age? (i.e., children who have reached their first birthday, but not their second birthday)
If Yes, Numbers of childrens 06-23 months:
Discuss any result not completed with team leader
No HH member at home or no competent respondent at home at time of visit
Entire household absent for extended period of time
Dwelling vacant or address not a dwelling
No child of 06-23 months in this household
Patient Demographics Section : Patient Demographics Section
Rose Angina Section : Rose Angina Section
Verifying Stroke Free Status Section (QVSF) : Verifying Stroke Free Status Section (QVSF)
International Physical Activity Section (IPAQ) : International Physical Activity Section (IPAQ)
The World Health Organization - Five Well-Being Index Section (WHO-5) : The World Health Organization Five WellBeing Index Section (WHO5)
The name of head of the household corresponds to the line listing data.
Name of new head of the household
Has the written consent been signed?
How many languages do you speak at home?
Do you ever have any pain or discomfort in your chest?
Where do you get this pain or discomfort (Please mark X on the appropriate places)
When you walk at an ordinary pace on the level does this produce the pain
When you walk uphill or hurry does this produce the pain
When you get any pain or discomfort in your chest on walking, what do you do?
Does the pain or discomfort in your chest go away if you stand still?
How long does it take to go away?
Have you ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that (you/he/she) had hypertension also called high blood pressure? (If high blood pressure only during pregnancy, code no)
Because of high blood pressure/hypertension have you/ has she ever been told to take prescribed medicine?
Were you ever told by a physician that you had a stroke?
Were you ever told by a physician that you had a TIA, ministroke or transient ischemic attack?
Have you ever had sudden painless weakness on one side of your body?
Have you ever had sudden numbness or a dead feeling on one side of your body?
Have you ever had sudden painless loss of vision in one or both eyes?
Have you ever suddenly lost one half of your vision?
Have you ever suddenly lost the ability to understand what people are saying?
Have you ever suddenly lost the ability to express yourself verbally or in writing?
During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities like heavy lifting, digging, aerobics, or fast bicycling?
How much time did you usually spend doing vigorous physical activities on one of those days?
During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate physical activities like carrying light loads, bicycling at a regular pace, or doubles tennis? Do not include walking.
How much time did you usually spend doing moderate physical activities on one of those days?
During the last 7 days, on how many days did you walk for at least 10 minutes at a time?
How much time did you usually spend walking on one of those days?
During the last 7 days, how much time did you spend sitting on a week day?
How often do you eat out for breakfast?
Two to three times a week
How often do you eat out for lunch?
Two to three times a week
How often do you eat out for dinner?
Two to three times a week
How often do you eat at buffets?
Two to three times a week
How often do you eat at fast food chains?
Two to three times a week
How often do you eat at a sit-down restaurant?
Two to three times a week
Please name the fast-food chain you visit most frequently?
Please name the sit-down restaurant you visit most frequently?
How often do you eat dairy products? (milk, cheese, etc.)
Two to three times a week
How often do you eat fruits? (fresh or canned)
Two to three times a week
How often do you eat vegetables or salad?
Two to three times a week
How often do you eat dessert/sweets? (Cake, Candies, Cookies, etc)
Two to three times a week
How often do you add table salt to your food?
Two to three times a week
How often do you cook your food with Ghee?
Two to three times a week
How many carbonated beverages do you drink per day?
How many caffeinated beverages do you drink per day?
How many alcoholic beverages do you drink per day?
Do you drink hard liquor or mixed drinks?
Current Less Than Daily Smokeless Tobacco Users
Do you currently smoke tobacco on a daily basis, less than daily, or not at all?
Have you smoked tobacco daily in the past?
In the past, have you smoked tobacco on a daily basis, less than daily or not at all?
How old were you when you first tried smoking tobacco even once?
How many years ago did you first try smoking tobacco even once?
How old were you when you first started smoking tobacco daily?
How many years ago did you first start smoking tobacco daily?
On average how many of the following products do you currently smoke each day? Also let me know if you smoke the product, but not every day?
Number of hookah/sheesha sessions per day?
Any other? (Please specify the other type that you currently smoke)
How soon after you wake up do you usually have your first smoke? Would you say within 5 minutes, 6 to 30 minutes, 31 to 60 minutes, or more than 60 minutes?
How many of the following do you currently smoke during a usual week?
Number of hookah/sheesha sessions per week?
Please specify the other type you currently smoke?
Do you currently use smokeless tobacco on a daily basis, less than daily, or not at all?
Have you used smokeless tobacco daily in the past?
In the past, have you used smokeless tobacco on a daily basis, less than daily, or not at all?
"How old were you when you first tried using smokeless tobacco, even once?\nHow old were you when you first tried smoking tobacco, even once?"
How many years ago did you first try using smokeless tobacco, even once?
How old were you when you first started using smokeless tobacco daily?
How many years ago did you first start using smokeless tobacco daily?
On average, how many times a day do you use the following products? Also, let me know if you use the product, but not every day.
Any others? (Please specify the other type you currently use)
How soon after you wake up do you usually use smokeless tobacco for the first time? Would you say within 5 minutes, 6 to 30 minutes, 31 to 60 minutes, or more than 60 minutes?
How many times a week do you usually use the following?
Please specify the other type you currently use

You mentioned that you smoke tobacco, but not every day, and that you also use smokeless tobacco, but not every day. Thinking about both smoking tobacco and using smokeless tobacco, would you say you use tobacco on a daily basis or less than daily?
The World Health Organization - Five Well-Being Index Section (WHO-5)
Please put a circle on each of the five statements which is closest to how you have been feeling over the last two weeks. Notice that higher numbers mean better wellbeing.
I have felt cheerful and in good spirits
Less than half of the time
More than half of the time
I have felt calm and relaxed
Less than half of the time
More than half of the time
I have felt active and vigorous
Less than half of the time
More than half of the time
I woke up feeling fresh and rested
Less than half of the time
More than half of the time
My daily life has been filled with things that interest me
Less than half of the time
More than half of the time
